20101217230749.333|20101217230751.000|CCO|VERY CONCERNED ABOUT SOUTH

20101217230753.000|20101217230755.000|CCO|JAPANESE OBJECTIVES, ABOUT U.S. 
20101217230755.000|20101217230757.000|CCO|OBJECTIVES.
20101217230757.000|20101217230759.000|CCO|THEY HAVE A GOOD RELATIONSHIP, 
20101217230759.000|20101217230801.000|CCO|AS YOU KNOW, WITH CHINA, AND A 
20101217230801.000|20101217230802.429|CCO|DECENT RELATIONSHIP, AT AS 
20101217230802.429|20101217230803.857|CCO|GOOD WITH RUSSIA, BUT THESE 
20101217230803.857|20101217230805.286|CCO|PEOPLE ARE WORRIED.
20101217230805.286|20101217230806.714|CCO|THEY HAVE A LONG HISTORY, AND 
20101217230806.714|20101217230808.143|CCO|THEY ARE WORRIED ABOUT WHAT 
20101217230808.143|20101217230809.571|CCO|SOUTH KOREA POTENTIALLY COULD 
20101217230809.571|20101217230811.000|CCO|DO, AND THEY BELIEVE THAT THE 
20101217230811.000|20101217230813.000|CCO|ONLY OCARD THEY REALLY HAVE IS 
20101217230813.000|20101217230815.000|CCO|THE MILITARY CAPABILITY, AND THE
